description.value:
Special: Razor-Sharp, Crippling (6)

Note: -20 to Awarness Tests to hear shots or discover weapon on person, can only attempt to hear from half distance. If Target takes no damage from weapon, must make -20 Tougness Test. If fail Stunned for 1 round per DoF. Can incorporate into another weapon as an upgrade, reducing clip size to 1, but test to discover -40.
